creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The BCEL docs mention various utilities - e.g Jasmin visitor - but these don't seem to be available from any of the downloads, only from SVN.

It would be useful to include the examples in both source and binary downloads

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1299378&view=rev
